main.name: Martin Hadid
main.bio: I am passionate about solving impactful business problems in areas of automation, data science, front-end development and user experience. I have been leading, coaching and training teams for the past four years to deliver experiences that delight customers and help drive business performance.

education.description: The ITC Data Science Fellows is a 5-month elite program for excellent STEM graduates inspired by the IDF's 8200 unit's methods focused on data analysis, data mining, machine learning and deep learning focused on Natural Language Processing (NLP).
